author: Benjamin Brown
title: Tribal nations face unique challenge in battle against coronavirus
description: With limited access to health care, lack of personal protective equipment and an older demographic that already suffers from high obesity and smoking rates, the coronavirus creates a disastrous situation for the 574 federally recognized American Indian Nation…
content:
LAS VEGAS -- While states across the country are reeling from the economic and health impact of COVID-19, the more than 500 native communities scattered across rural America are facing their own battle with the deadly virus.
